text: We stayed in the library room, it was like a nice dark cave for sleeping.  The setting of the house is very relaxing, and we spent a good amount of time sitting in the front sun room soaking up the sun.  We had everything we needed and it was great.  House is close enough for the ambitious walker to hoof it over to Barton Springs, or a short bike ride.
title: Lotus House Queen Bed/Bath Beauty
